synopsis.text: Furuya's fascination with the undead is more than just a passing interest; it's an obsession that consumes his every thought. From collecting zombie figurines to watching horror films, his dream is to have a zombie girlfriend. When his beloved cat meets an untimely end, Furuya takes matters into his own hands, attempting to concoct a resurrection potion in an abandoned building. It's here that he crosses paths with Rea, a high-class girl with her own set of troubles. After a series of unfortunate events, Rea finds herself transformed into the very creature Furuya idolizes. Now, the horror enthusiast must navigate the challenges of having a zombie girlfriend, including her newfound appetite and the onset of rigor mortis. As their worlds collide, Furuya and Rea must adjust to their strange new reality, where the line between life and death is blurred. Will this macabre dream turn into a nightmare, or will Furuya finally get the zombie romance he's always desired?
